verses.verse: וַיִּ֨מְלָךְ־ <WH4427> reigned מֶ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> And king צִדְקִיָּ֖הוּ <WH6667> Zedekiah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יֹֽאשִׁיָּ֑הוּ <WH2977> of Josiah תַּ֗חַת <WH8478> place כָּנְיָ֙הוּ֙ <WH3659> instead of Coniah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יְה֣וֹיָקִ֔ים <WH3079> of Jehoiakim אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> whom הִמְלִ֛יךְ <WH4427> made king נְבוּכַדְרֶאצַּ֥ר <WH5019> whom Nebuchadrezzar מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king בָּבֶ֖ל <WH894> of Babylon בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> in the land יְהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> of Judah

וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> neither שָׁמַ֛ע <WH8085> did hearken ה֥וּא <WH1931> he וַעֲבָדָ֖יו <WH5650> But neither he nor his servants וְעַ֣ם <WH5971> nor the people הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> of the land אֶל־ <WH413> to דִּבְרֵ֣י <WH1697> unto the words יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which דִּבֶּ֔ר <WH1696> which he spake בְּיַ֖ד <WH3027> by יִרְמְיָ֥הוּ <WH3414> Jeremiah הַנָּבִֽיא׃ <WH5030> the prophet

וַיִּשְׁלַח֩ <WH7971> sent הַמֶּ֨לֶךְ <WH4428> the king צִדְקִיָּ֜הוּ <WH6667> And Zedekiah אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוּכַ֣ל <WH3081> Jehucal בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son שֶֽׁלֶמְיָ֗ה <WH8018> of Shelemiah וְאֶת־ <WH853> צְפַנְיָ֤הוּ <WH6846> and Zephaniah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son מַֽעֲשֵׂיָה֙ <WH4641> of Maaseiah הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <WH3548> the priest אֶל־ <WH413> to יִרְמְיָ֥הוּ <WH3414> Jeremiah הַנָּבִ֖יא <WH5030> to the prophet לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying הִתְפַּלֶּל־ <WH6419> Pray נָ֣א <WH4994> Please בַעֲדֵ֔נוּ <WH5704> against אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> now unto the LORD אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <WH430> our God

וְיִרְמְיָ֕הוּ <WH3414> Now Jeremiah בָּ֥א <WH935> came in וְיֹצֵ֖א <WH3318> and went out בְּת֣וֹךְ <WH8432> among הָעָ֑ם <WH5971> the people וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> not נָתְנ֥וּ <WH5414> for they had not put אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> court [הַכְּלִיא כ] (הַכְּלֽוּא׃ <WH3628> prison ק)

וְחֵ֥יל <WH2428> army פַּרְעֹ֖ה <WH6547> Then Pharaoh's יָצָ֣א <WH3318> was come forth מִמִּצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> out of Egypt וַיִּשְׁמְע֨וּ <WH8085> heard הַכַּשְׂדִּ֜ים <WH3778> and when the Chaldeans הַצָּרִ֤ים <WH6696> that besieged עַל־ <WH5921> and יְרוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <WH3389> Jerusalem אֶת־ <WH853> שִׁמְעָ֔ם <WH8088> tidings וַיֵּ֣עָל֔וּ <WH5927> of them they departed מֵעַ֖ל <WH5921> the from יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> from Jerusalem פ
וַֽיְהִי֙ <WH1961> came דְּבַר־ <WH1697> Then came the word יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to יִרְמְיָ֥הוּ <WH3414> Jeremiah הַנָּבִ֖יא <WH5030> unto the prophet לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֤ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> Thus תֹֽאמְרוּ֙ <WH559> Thus shall ye say אֶל־ <WH413> to מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> to the king יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah הַשֹּׁלֵ֧חַ <WH7971> that sent אֶתְכֶ֛ם <WH853> אֵלַ֖י <WH413> to לְדָרְשֵׁ֑נִי <WH1875> you unto me to enquire הִנֵּ֣ה ׀ <WH2009> Behold חֵ֣יל <WH2428> army פַּרְעֹ֗ה <WH6547> of me Behold Pharaoh's הַיֹּצֵ֤א <WH3318> which is come forth לָכֶם֙ לְעֶזְרָ֔ה <WH5833> to help שָׁ֥ב <WH7725> you shall return לְאַרְצ֖וֹ <WH776> into their own land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> to Egypt

וְשָׁ֙בוּ֙ <WH7725> shall come again הַכַּשְׂדִּ֔ים <WH3778> And the Chaldeans וְנִלְחֲמ֖וּ <WH3898> and fight עַל־ <WH5921> against הָעִ֣יר <WH5892> against this city הַזֹּ֑את <WH2063> and they וּלְכָדֻ֖הָ <WH3920> and take וּשְׂרָפֻ֥הָ <WH8313> it and burn בָאֵֽשׁ׃ <WH784> it with fire ס

כֹּ֣ה ׀ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD אַל־ <WH408> nay תַּשִּׁ֤אוּ <WH5377> Deceive נַפְשֹֽׁתֵיכֶם֙ <WH5315> not yourselves לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying הָלֹ֛ךְ <WH1980> shall surely יֵלְכ֥וּ <WH1980> go מֵעָלֵ֖ינוּ <WH5921> and הַכַּשְׂדִּ֑ים <WH3778> The Chaldeans כִּי־ <WH3588> for לֹ֖א <WH3808> they will not יֵלֵֽכוּ׃ <WH1980> go

כִּ֣י <WH3588> even אִם־ <WH518> if הִכִּיתֶ֞ם <WH5221> For though ye had smitten כָּל־ <WH3605> the entire חֵ֤יל <WH2428> the whole army כַּשְׂדִּים֙ <WH3778> of the Chaldeans הַנִּלְחָמִ֣ים <WH3898> that fight אִתְּכֶ֔ם <WH854> against וְנִ֨שְׁאֲרוּ <WH7604> against you and there remained בָ֔ם אֲנָשִׁ֖ים <WH376> every man מְדֻקָּרִ֑ים <WH1856> [but] wounded אִ֤ישׁ <WH376> each בְּאָהֳלוֹ֙ <WH168> in his tent יָק֔וּמוּ <WH6965> among them [yet] should they rise up וְשָֽׂרְפ֛וּ <WH8313> and burn אֶת־ <WH853> הָעִ֥יר <WH5892> this city הַזֹּ֖את <WH2063> with בָּאֵֽשׁ׃ <WH784> with fire

וְהָיָ֗ה <WH1961> happened בְּהֵֽעָלוֹת֙ <WH5927> was broken up חֵ֣יל <WH2428> And it came to pass that when the army הַכַּשְׂדִּ֔ים <WH3778> of the Chaldeans מֵעַ֖ל <WH5921> and יְרֽוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> from Jerusalem מִפְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> for fear חֵ֥יל <WH2428> army פַּרְעֹֽה׃ <WH6547> of Pharaoh's ס

וַיֵּצֵ֤א <WH3318> went forth יִרְמְיָ֙הוּ֙ <WH3414> Then Jeremiah מִיר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> out of Jerusalem לָלֶ֖כֶת <WH1980> to go אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> into the land בִּנְיָמִ֑ן <WH1144> of Benjamin לַחֲלִ֥ק <WH2505> to separate מִשָּׁ֖ם <WH8033> in it בְּת֥וֹךְ <WH8432> himself thence in the midst הָעָֽם׃ <WH5971> of the people

וַיְהִי־ <WH1961> become ה֞וּא <WH1931> he בְּשַׁ֣עַר <WH8179> And when he was in the gate בִּנְיָמִ֗ן <WH1144> of Benjamin וְשָׁם֙ <WH8033> was there בַּ֣עַל <WH1167> a captain פְּקִדֻ֔ת <WH6488> of the ward וּשְׁמוֹ֙ <WH8034> [was] there whose name יִרְאִיָּ֔יה <WH3376> [was] Irijah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son שֶֽׁלֶמְיָ֖ה <WH8018> of Shelemiah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son חֲנַנְיָ֑ה <WH2608> of Hananiah וַיִּתְפֹּ֞שׂ <WH8610> and he took אֶֽת־ <WH853> יִרְמְיָ֤הוּ <WH3414> Jeremiah הַנָּבִיא֙ <WH5030> the prophet לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying אֶל־ <WH413> to הַכַּשְׂדִּ֖ים <WH3778> to the Chaldeans אַתָּ֥ה <WH859> You נֹפֵֽל׃ <WH5307> Thou fallest away

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> Then said יִרְמְיָ֜הוּ <WH3414> Jeremiah שֶׁ֗קֶר <WH8267> [It is] false אֵינֶ֤נִּי <WH369> I am not נֹפֵל֙ <WH5307> I fall not away עַל־ <WH5921> unto הַכַּשְׂדִּ֔ים <WH3778> to the Chaldeans וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> not שָׁמַ֖ע <WH8085> But he hearkened אֵלָ֑יו <WH413> about וַיִּתְפֹּ֤שׂ <WH8610> took יִרְאִיָּיה֙ <WH3376> not to him so Irijah בְּיִרְמְיָ֔הוּ <WH3414> Jeremiah וַיְבִאֵ֖הוּ <WH935> and brought אֶל־ <WH413> to הַשָּׂרִֽים׃ <WH8269> him to the princes

וַיִּקְצְפ֧וּ <WH7107> were wroth הַשָּׂרִ֛ים <WH8269> Wherefore the princes עַֽל־ <WH5921> at יִרְמְיָ֖הוּ <WH3414> with Jeremiah וְהִכּ֣וּ <WH5221> and smote אֹת֑וֹ <WH853> וְנָתְנ֨וּ <WH5414> him and put אוֹת֜וֹ <WH853> בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> in the house הָאֵס֗וּר <WH612> him in prison בֵּ֚ית <WH1004> the house יְהוֹנָתָ֣ן <WH3083> of Jonathan הַסֹּפֵ֔ר <WH5608> the scribe כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אֹת֥וֹ <WH853> עָשׂ֖וּ <WH6213> for they had made לְבֵ֥ית <WH1004> the house הַכֶּֽלֶא׃ <WH3608> that the prison

כִּ֣י <WH3588> for בָ֧א <WH935> was entered יִרְמְיָ֛הוּ <WH3414> When Jeremiah אֶל־ <WH413> about בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> court הַבּ֖וֹר <WH953> cistern וְאֶל־ <WH413> about הַֽחֲנֻ֑יוֹת <WH2588> and into the cabins וַיֵּֽשֶׁב־ <WH3427> had remained שָׁ֥ם <WH8033> there יִרְמְיָ֖הוּ <WH3414> and Jeremiah יָמִ֥ים <WH3117> days רַבִּֽים׃ <WH7227> there many פ

וַיִּשְׁלַח֩ <WH7971> sent הַמֶּ֨לֶךְ <WH4428> the king צִדְקִיָּ֜הוּ <WH6667> Then Zedekiah וַיִּקָּחֵ֗הוּ <WH3947> and took him out וַיִּשְׁאָלֵ֨הוּ <WH7592> asked הַמֶּ֤לֶךְ <WH4428> and the king בְּבֵיתוֹ֙ <WH1004> in his house בַּסֵּ֔תֶר <WH5643> him secretly וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> and said הֲיֵ֥שׁ <WH3426> There is דָּבָ֖ר <WH1697> Is there [any] word מֵאֵ֣ת <WH853> יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Jehovah וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said יִרְמְיָ֙הוּ֙ <WH3414> Jeremiah יֵ֔שׁ <WH3426> There וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> for said בְּיַ֥ד <WH3027> into the hand מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> of the king בָּבֶ֖ל <WH894> of Babylon תִּנָּתֵֽן׃ <WH5414> he thou shalt be delivered ס

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said יִרְמְיָ֔הוּ <WH3414> Moreover Jeremiah אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> unto king צִדְקִיָּ֑הוּ <WH6667> Zedekiah מֶה֩ <WH4100> what חָטָ֨אתִֽי <WH2398> What have I offended לְךָ֤ וְלַעֲבָדֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH5650> against thee or against thy servants וְלָעָ֣ם <WH5971> or against this people הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> this כִּֽי־ <WH3588> that נְתַתֶּ֥ם <WH5414> that ye have put אוֹתִ֖י <WH853> אֶל־ <WH413> about בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> court הַכֶּֽלֶא׃ <WH3608> prison

[וְאַיֹּו כ] (וְאַיֵּה֙ <WH346> where ק) נְבִ֣יאֵיכֶ֔ם <WH5030> your prophets אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who נִבְּא֥וּ <WH5012> which prophesied לָכֶ֖ם לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> unto you saying לֹֽא־ <WH3808> will not יָבֹ֤א <WH935> shall not come מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> The king בָּבֶל֙ <WH894> of Babylon עֲלֵיכֶ֔ם <WH5921> against וְעַ֖ל <WH5921> against הָאָ֥רֶץ <WH776> common הַזֹּֽאת׃ <WH2063> But

וְעַתָּ֕ה <WH6258> now שְֽׁמַֽע־ <WH8085> Therefore hear נָ֖א <WH4994> please אֲדֹנִ֣י <WH113> now I pray thee O my lord הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> the king תִּפָּל־ <WH5307> I pray thee be accepted נָ֤א <WH4994> please תְחִנָּתִי֙ <WH8467> let my supplication לְפָנֶ֔יךָ <WH6440> before וְאַל־ <WH408> not תְּשִׁבֵ֗נִי <WH7725> thee that thou cause me not to return בֵּ֚ית <WH1004> to the house יְהוֹנָתָ֣ן <WH3083> of Jonathan הַסֹּפֵ֔ר <WH5608> the scribe וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> may not אָמ֖וּת <WH4191> lest I die שָֽׁם׃ <WH8033> there

וַיְצַוֶּ֞ה <WH6680> commanded הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> the king צִדְקִיָּ֗הוּ <WH6667> Then Zedekiah וַיַּפְקִ֣דוּ <WH6485> that they should commit אֶֽת־ <WH853> יִרְמְיָהוּ֮ <WH3414> Jeremiah בַּחֲצַ֣ר <WH2691> into the court הַמַּטָּרָה֒ <WH4307> of the prison וְנָתֹן֩ <WH5414> and that they should give ל֨וֹ כִכַּר־ <WH3603> a piece לֶ֤חֶם <WH3899> of bread לַיּוֹם֙ <WH3117> him daily מִח֣וּץ <WH2351> street הָאֹפִ֔ים <WH644> out of the bakers' עַד־ <WH5704> until תֹּ֥ם <WH8552> were spent כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַלֶּ֖חֶם <WH3899> until all the bread מִן־ <WH4480> in הָעִ֑יר <WH5892> in the city וַיֵּ֣שֶׁב <WH3427> remained יִרְמְיָ֔הוּ <WH3414> Thus Jeremiah בַּחֲצַ֖ר <WH2691> in the court הַמַּטָּרָֽה׃ <WH4307> of the prison
